Our approach is rooted in robust problem-definition and customising the solution. In an industry built on standard templates and processes, we explore creative solutions for each brief. And, of course, superior execution is a widely acknowledged strength of Adfactors PR.

Our business is built on a few simple tenets. In a complex world with trust deficit, we believe public relations is 90 per cent behaviour and 10 per cent communications.

As a firm, we practice what we preach. Culture is our strength and our culture is built on simple tenets of integrity, transparency, fairness and simplicity. Constant, incremental innovation for creating value for our clients is also a part of our value system. The few businesses that we do not work for include: Tobacco, alcohol, meat-processing and gambling.

In 2014, 2015 and 2016, we won every single agency recognition for PR firms in India/South Asia. We also became the first Indian firm to have won global recognitions for our campaigns. In the last three years, we have won over 100 awards for PR campaign excellence at prestigious fora such as The Holmes Report, PRWeek, Campaign, GoaFest and exchange4media – surpassing our peer group by a wide margin.

If you’d like to find out more about us, drop us an email  at business@adfactorspr.com

agencies.name: Hustle Marketers
agencies.description:
With a name like Hustle Marketers, you can be sure that our story really reflects the ambition and hustle that is the root of our agency. 

Our founder, Shanky grew up always striving for more. The hustler mentality is a key part of his character! As a teenager, this manifested in him creating opportunities for himself whenever he could. Nothing stopped him from creating waves wherever he found himself. 

That's why, when he found himself stuck in the corporate rat race, he began to feel defeated. He looked at the life he had ahead of him one that relied on the demands of others. It felt like he had committed himself to a life that didnt reflect his true nature. Instead of succumbing to these pressures (like many people do), he tapped into his true nature. The nature of a hustler. He looked at his options. He could continue to work his way up in the company. Or, he could be in charge right now, quit his job, and start his own digital marketing agency. One with its own rules. 

Can you guess what option he chose? Thats right. 

He began Hustle Marketers. From the ground up, he built a reliable, expert-driven business that thrives on the mindset of the hustler. Now, Hustle Marketers is an integrated agency that covers all marketing bases. Our talented employees deliver industry-leading work. But, most importantly, we hustle everyday to be the very best that we can be.

We believe in pushing the boundaries of creativity and setting new standards of achievement for ourselves. The principles of Kaizen, teach us to:-

•   Draw conclusions from data and manage with facts 
•   Review the situations yourself
•   For good results, have good processes
•   Solve issue from the root, and quickly contain problems
•   Teamwork is the key 

Applying these principles and more, Kaizen Design Studio has grown from strength to strength and is now one of the most sought after, digital marketing companies in Pune. Therefore, to get the Kaizen advantage for your business, get in touch with us.


Our Philosophy

At first glance, you’ll notice a reverse ‘K’ symbolizing Kaizen, but the logo is also a > sign alongside a line. On the other side is the name of Kaizen Design Studio. This symbolizes that fact the Kaizen Design Studio of the future promises to be better than today. We strive to continuously improve and in turn pass on better services to our clients. We study the past, are aware of the present and look to the future.

Identifies target audience: The first step in any digital marketing campaign is to identify the target audience. This involves understanding the demographics, interests, and behavior patterns of the people that the company is trying to reach.

Develops a marketing strategy: Based on the target audience and business goals, the digital marketing company will develop a comprehensive marketing strategy that includes tactics like search engine optimization (SEO), paid advertising, social media marketing, and email marketing.

Creates marketing materials: The digital marketing company will create marketing materials like website content, social media posts, email newsletters, and ads to help promote the brand and its products.

Executes marketing campaigns: The digital marketing company will then execute the marketing campaigns, using tactics like email marketing, paid advertising, and social media marketing to reach the target audience and drive engagement.

Analyzes and adjusts: Finally, the digital marketing company will track the results of the marketing campaigns and adjust the strategy as needed to maximize the effectiveness of the marketing efforts. This may involve testing different tactics, targeting different audience segments, or adjusting the marketing budget.

agencies.name: SeoTonic
agencies.description:
SEOTonic is a full-service online marketing agency that was founded in 2006 with only three clients and a team of five dedicated web professionals on board. Our team – and our client base – has grown tremendously since then due to our dedication to one overriding mission: to deliver results. Today, the SEOTonic team includes more than 55 experienced web professionals who diligently serve more than 300 active clients around the world.

SEOTonic’s growth has been deliberate and steady to ensure adherence to our slogan: Be Honest. Be Loyal. Be Devoted. Our clients’ satisfaction is our ultimate goal. Our responsibility is to provide each of our clients with maximum returns on their investments.

How We Do Things
SEOTonic takes a strategic approach to every project we take on. We believe if the process is sound, results will come. To this end, our SEO process starts with extensive research and goal-setting for each and every campaign we take on so that clients can rest assured our efforts are achieving all-important benchmarks.

Once a campaign is researched and defined, we assign an in-house team to drive results. The team selected is handpicked for each client based on campaign size and the components required. Our intent is to ensure that every member of the team serving on a client’s campaign brings necessary expertise to drive results. Every campaign includes a SEO account manager, an SEO expert and link-building expert, among other valuable players. Our small business SEO plans and those tailored for larger firms are designed from the ground up to drive traffic through rankings in SERPs.

agencies.name: Web Wallah
agencies.description:
Web Wallah was founded in 2019 by two ambitious 17-year-old tech enthusiasts, Mayank Kumar and Krishna Sagar who completed their studies at the top institution of India Jawahar Navodaya Vidyalaya. Web Wallah started as a dream between these two classmates when they were both in tenth grade. They were deeply fascinated by the digital world and eager to create technological solutions that fulfilled their passion and offered us an avenue to earn.

The journey of Web Wallah began with the perfect name after a lot of brainstorming, inspired by the popularity of "Physics Wallah" among our peers, and when our classmate suggested "Web Wallah," it immediately resonated with us. With that, our journey took off as we registered our domain and started setting up the website.

Then something unexpected happened that was COVID-19 which turned into a surprising boon for us. With schools closed and exams postponed, Mayank found himself with the rare opportunity to fully dedicate his time to nurturing Web Wallah. While Krishna took a temporary break to prepare for his NEET exams, Mayank took the reins of our venture, transitioning into a solopreneur.

In 2020, We secured our first client, Jiksha Pathology, marking the beginning of an enriching professional journey. This initial project, crafted with immense effort and dedication, set the tone for what Web Wallah was destined to become. Over the years, I have been fortunate to work on hundreds of websites, helping numerous clients enhance their digital presence.

Then in the same year, Mayank also started his startups JNVST Prep and CSHUB to boost the ed-tech industry. Gradually, Mayank kept taking Web Wallah to the next level and in Dec 2023 Web Wallah was finally incorporated with the Government of India. And when we start doing much better then we expand our team with multiple roles.
